name: Rugged Soul - TV Game Jam 2019
description:
Submission for the TV Game Jam 2019! 

Inspiration: Dexter's Laboratory - Season 2, Episode 1

Inspired by the episode that showed just how powerful beards can be. Sadly, we didn't get to most of the stuff we were hoping to, but hopefully we'll be polishing this up in the future!

Controls:

  • Move: Arrows / WASD
  • Attack/Combo: C / J 
  • Jump: X / K

Team

  • Sosuko - Coding/Development
  • KolEggzn - Character Art
  • Kitarraman - Music/SFX
  • Ainn - Level Art/Character Polish
